titles.title: To authorize an appropriation for the construction of a public museum located in, and relating to the history of, the State of New Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to make a grant to the State of New Mexico for the construction of a public museum in Sante Fe to house and display art and artifacts relating to New Mexico's history. Conditions such grant on New Mexico's agreement to expend not less than $11 million of non-Federal funds for such construction. Authorizes appropriations.
